nodes.bodyText: You can use org.keycloak.OAuth2Constants#ERROR_DESCRIPTION. The server should return OAuth2Constants#ERROR_DESCRIPTION and not "error-description".
Good point. I already changed that locally to ERROR_DESCRIPTION but then I realized the _ vs. -. Thought it was by intention.

Maybe you can set a single IO/Worker thread as follows:
.setIoThreads(1)
.setWorkerThreads(1)
We should probably advertise in our change notes the removal of HttpResponseWriter from the API?
